widget-play-by-play.comment: Rick Valentine (Clovers) wins a free kick in the attacking half of the field.
Corner Kick for Alchemists. Conceded by Alphonse Tucker.
Foul by Martin Pierto (Clovers).
Goal! Franklin Stevens (Alchemists) scored with the right foot. Assisted by David Hawkins. (1-0)
Paramedics entered the field to check Christofer Grass (Alchemists) for a nasty fall.
Johnny Griffin (Clovers) is shown the yellow card for a bad kick to Brian Kingster’s shin.
Foul by Spike Arrowhead (Alchemists).
After 2 additional minutes starts the Halftime.
Markus Jackson enters the field and substitutes Rick Valentine for the Clovers.
Foul by Dany Stak (Clovers).
Brian Kingster (Alchemists) is shown the red card for an intentional kick to Martin Pierto.
Attempt saved. Nick Rodgers (Alchemists) made an incredible save in the top corner of the goal.
Penalty Kick. Alphonse Tucker (Clovers) blocked a shot in the area with his hand.
Goal! Christofer Grass (Alchemists) scored a penalty kick after a hand by Alphonse Tucker. (2-0)
Offside of Chris Balleron (Clovers).
Attempt missed. Michael Netter (Clovers) right foot shot from outside the box is too high.
Wally Christison (Clovers) is shown the yellow card for a headbutt to David Hawkins’s face.
The referee adds 4 minutes of additional time.
End of the game. The Alchemists won 2-0.
Additional Icon: Soccer Ball Own Goal.
Additional Icon: Soccer Ball Missed Penalty.

newslog.content: Mark Johnson has a tibia fracture and he’s gonna be out of the play for 2 months.
Dominick R. Blink, a new Shooting Guard from San Francisco has joined the team!.
Christopher Grifin, a new Power Forward from Rockstar Bay College has joined the team!.
Thomas Durry has a composed hand fracture and he won’t be playing untill September.
Jeremy Rittersen left the team after 2 year in the club and his new house are the Clovers.

desc.label: Team Bio:
desc.value: Based in California, and founded by Faye Spiegel “The Game Huntress”,  The Alchemists L.O. Heroes ended up being one of the strongests teams in the world.

newslog.content: James Messinal’s knee fracture is healing properly and will be returning to the field next week.
James Messinal has a knee fracture and he’s gonna be out of the play for 4 months.
James Messinal is now the 1st Shooting Guard after being 3rd Shooting Guard for the past year.
James Messinal has an abductor strain so he will miss the next game against the LA Pirates.
James Messinal has an abductor strain so he will miss the next game against the LA Pirates.
James Messinal won the Player of the Year 2014 Award for the first time.
James Messinal has a lower back contusion and will miss the next two games.
James Messinal has joined the team after playing for the California Surfers for a year.

newslog.content: Jenny Thomps is now the new Team Recruiter for the East Coast Colleges.
Robert Frankson will have a surgery and will be out for a month. Interim coach will be Frank Roberts.
Max Stevens is now the 2nd Team Doctor after a succesfull run in the Sharks.
Tommy Flankers left the team after 2 years as the 2nd Team Doctor.
Patrick Storm is now the new Team Recruiter for the West Coast Colleges.
Alexa Polson is now the new Athletic Trainer after a succesfull run in the Pirates.
Savannah Lavender is the new Team Nutritionist with more than 500.000 followers.
Robert Frankson is now the new Alchemist Coach after a succesfull run in the Lucky Clovers.

commentary.text: Rick Valentine wins a free kick in the attacking half of the field.
Corner Kick for Alchemists. Conceded by Alphonse Tucker.
Goal! Franklin Stevens scored with the right foot. Assisted by David Hawkins. (1-0)
Paramedics entered the field to check Christofer Grass for a nasty fall.
Johnny Griffin is shown the yellow card for a bad kick to Brian Kingster’s shin.
Markus Jackson enters the field and substitutes Rick Valentine.
Brian Kingster is shown the red card for an intentional kick to Martin Pierto.
Attempt saved. Nick Rodgers made an incredible save in the top corner of the goal.
Penalty Kick. Alphonse Tucker blocked a shot in the area with his hand.
Goal! Christofer Grass scored a penalty kick after a hand by Alphonse Tucker. (2-0)
Attempt mised. Michael Netter right foot shot from outside the box is too high.
Wally Christison is shown the yellow card for a headbutt to David Hawkins’s face.

subheader2.subtitle: The referee adds 4 minutes of additional time.

secondary.title: Spectacular view from the top of the stadium
"Shiw Wow" is the Alchemists new pet, check him out!
Checkout the new ride of our best player of the season
